description:
Kaley Cuoco is jumping on the pixie cut bandwagon.卡蕾·库柯（Kaley Cuoco）也加入了夏日短发的时尚大潮。

The Big Bang Theory star debuted her new 'do on Instagram Saturday, posting a split photo along with the caption: "Thank you @clsymonds for bringing out my inner Peter Pan :) #byronbeverlyhills #justcutitoff."这位凭借《生活大爆炸》（The Big Bang Theory）中佩妮（Penny）一角为人熟知的美国女星上周日在Instagram上展示了自己的最新发型。她贴出了一张两格照片，并配文“感谢@clsymonds释放出我内心的彼得·潘（Peter Pan）:)#byronbeverlyhills #justcutitoff.”

This isn't the first time Cuoco has changed up her hairstyle in recent months. In April, she showed off a new bob haircut.这并不是库柯近几个月来第一次剪短发。早在四月，她就秀出了自己俏丽的波波头。

What do you think of her new look?大家觉得她的新发型怎么样？
